errors.error_description: Version incompatibility between Python2.7 and Django 2.2 or later
correction_candidates: Change 'Django 2.2 or later' to 'Django 1.11 or earlier'
Change the entire sentence to 'LNLDB now runs under Python3.8 and Django 3.2 or later'

errors.error_description: Unnecessary dependencies nodejs, npm, webpack added to Linux installation command
correction_candidates: Remove 'nodejs npm webpack' from the apt-get install command
Move 'nodejs npm webpack' to a separate installation step
errors.golden_answer: Remove 'nodejs npm webpack' from the apt-get install command
